_metadata.description: Method of Moderation equations in machine-readable format
_metadata.notation: Unicode mathematical symbols matching paper notation

utility.name: CRRA Utility Function
utility.sympy_repr: Mul(Pow(Symbol('c', real=True, positive=True), Add(Integer(1), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('Ï', real=True, positive=True)))), Pow(Add(Integer(1), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('Ï', real=True, positive=True))), Integer(-1)))

marginal_utility.name: Marginal Utility
marginal_utility.sympy_repr: Pow(Symbol('c', real=True, positive=True), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('Ï', real=True, positive=True)))

patience_factor.name: Absolute Patience Factor
patience_factor.sympy_repr: Pow(Mul(Symbol('R', real=True, positive=True), Symbol('Î²', real=True, positive=True)), Pow(Symbol('Ï', real=True, positive=True), Integer(-1)))

mpc_min.name: Minimum MPC
mpc_min.sympy_repr: Add(Integer(1), Mul(Integer(-1), Pow(Symbol('R', real=True, positive=True), Integer(-1)), Symbol('Ã', real=True, positive=True)))

mpc_max.name: Maximum MPC
mpc_max.sympy_repr: Add(Integer(1), Mul(Integer(-1), Pow(Symbol('R', real=True, positive=True), Integer(-1)), Symbol('Ã', real=True, positive=True), Pow(Symbol('â„˜', real=True, positive=True), Pow(Symbol('Ï', real=True, positive=True), Integer(-1)))))

human_wealth.name: Human Wealth (Optimist)
human_wealth.sympy_repr: Mul(Symbol('Î“', real=True, positive=True), Pow(Add(Symbol('R', real=True, positive=True), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('Î“', real=True, positive=True))), Integer(-1)))

consumption_optimist.name: Optimist Consumption
consumption_optimist.sympy_repr: Mul(Symbol('ğ›‹_min', real=True, positive=True), Add(Symbol('hÌ„', real=True), Symbol('m', real=True, positive=True)))

consumption_pessimist.name: Pessimist Consumption
consumption_pessimist.sympy_repr: Mul(Symbol('ğ›‹_min', real=True, positive=True), Add(Symbol('m', real=True, positive=True), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('m_min', real=True))))

moderation_ratio.name: Moderation Ratio
moderation_ratio.sympy_repr: Mul(Add(Symbol('ğœÌ‚', real=True, positive=True), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('ğ›‹_min', real=True, positive=True), Add(Symbol('m', real=True, positive=True), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('m_min', real=True))))), Pow(Add(Mul(Symbol('ğ›‹_min', real=True, positive=True), Add(Symbol('hÌ„', real=True), Symbol('m', real=True, positive=True))), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('ğ›‹_min', real=True, positive=True), Add(Symbol('m', real=True, positive=True), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('m_min', real=True))))), Integer(-1)))

log_excess_resources.name: Log Excess Resources
log_excess_resources.sympy_repr: log(Add(Symbol('m', real=True, positive=True), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('m_min', real=True))))

logit_moderation.name: Chi Function (Logit)
logit_moderation.sympy_repr: log(Mul(Symbol('ğ›š', real=True, positive=True), Pow(Add(Integer(1), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('ğ›š', real=True, positive=True))), Integer(-1))))

consumption_reconstructed.name: Reconstructed Consumption
consumption_reconstructed.description: Final consumption formula from Method of Moderation
consumption_reconstructed.sympy_latex: ğ›‹_{min} \left(m - m_{min}\right) + \frac{ğ›‹_{min} \left(hÌ„ + m\right) - ğ›‹_{min} \left(m - m_{min}\right)}{1 + e^{- ğ›˜Ì‚}}
consumption_reconstructed.sympy_repr: Add(Mul(Symbol('ğ›‹_min', real=True, positive=True), Add(Symbol('m', real=True, positive=True), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('m_min', real=True)))), Mul(Pow(Add(Integer(1), exp(Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('ğ›˜Ì‚', real=True)))), Integer(-1)), Add(Mul(Symbol('ğ›‹_min', real=True, positive=True), Add(Symbol('hÌ„', real=True), Symbol('m', real=True, positive=True))), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('ğ›‹_min', real=True, positive=True), Add(Symbol('m', real=True, positive=True), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('m_min', real=True)))))))

cusp_point.name: Cusp Point
cusp_point.sympy_repr: Add(Symbol('m_min', real=True), Mul(Symbol('Î”h', real=True, positive=True), Symbol('ğ›‹_min', real=True, positive=True), Pow(Add(Symbol('ğ›‹_max', real=True, positive=True), Mul(Integer(-1), Symbol('ğ›‹_min', real=True, positive=True))), Integer(-1))))
